title: syscall: Recvfrom fails with "address family not supported by protocol family" if incorrect buffer provided
body:
by **apatrushev**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. http://play.golang.org/p/Twk04P1T37
2. Call ReadFromUDP with slice of length 0

What is the expected output?
IDNK. Maybe another error.

What do you see instead?
strange error message

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
default "go build" compiler

Which operating system are you using?
Mac OS X

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version go1.0.3

Please provide any additional information below.
